name: Raygun.io
overview:
Raygun integrates with existing software and reports errors automatically for easy reporting, notifications and management of software bugs.

Raygun (http://raygun.io) is a hosted Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) product, designed to assist companies in improving the reliability of their software by providing timely and manageable feedback on software errors. Raygun ensures that teams get sensible notifications, rather than one per error, that gives trend analysis and keeps them updated as an error progresses. The website gives instant insight into the overall health of the software it is monitoring – outstanding errors, grouped lists of errors, how the health of the software is trending and more. Once an error occurs Raygun records as much information about it as possible to help developers resolve bugs more quickly.
